name: 陳秀慧
objective:
教授基本的重量、滴定、電位、光譜和分子分光分析並就如何取樣，分離以及所得的數據做一分析，另就分析上所用之藥品，裝置及單元操作予以說明。
The content of this course includes gravimetric, titrimetric potentiometric, spectroscopic methods of analysis.  Topics in statistics and data analysis, preparation and analysis of real samples, and equipment and practice of chemical analysis are also discussed.
schedule:
W1. The Nature of Analytical Chemistry
W2.  Chemicals, Apparatus, and Unit Operations of Analytical Chemistry
W3. Using Spreadsheets in Analytical Chemistry
W4.. Calculations Used in Analytical Chemistry
W5. Errors in Chemical Analyses
W6.. Random Errors in Chemical Analysis
W7. Statistical Data Treatment and Evaluation
W8. Sampling, Standardization, and Calibration
W9. Aqueous Solutions and Chemical Equilibria
W10. Effect of Electrolytes on Chemical Equilibria
W11. Solving Equilibrium Problems for Complex Systems
W12. Gravimetric Methods of Analysis
W13. Titrations in Analytical Chemistry 
W14. Principles of Neutralization Titrations
W15. Complex Acid/Bases Systems
W16. Applications of Neutralization Titrations
W17. Complexation and Precipitation Reactions and Titrations
W18. Final Exam
materials: Fundamentals of Analytical Chemistry, by Skoog, West, Holler and Crouch, 9th edition
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）AI3：使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）AI4：簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）AI5：深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
remarks: 如遇特殊裝況將採 teams 線上授課
